{"id":1080979010,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1697942072,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1080979010/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Sum of Mountain Triplets I","memory":"21.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        \n        int sum=INT_MAX,n=nums.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<n-2;i++){\n            for(int j=i+1;j<n-1;j++){\n                for(int k=j+1;k<n;k++){\n                    int l=0;\n                    if(nums[i] < nums[j] and nums[k] < nums[j]){\n                        l=nums[i]+nums[j]+nums[k];\n                        sum=min(sum,l);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        if(sum==INT_MAX)return -1;\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-sum-of-mountain-triplets-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
